long_description: The Nature Kaleidoscope kit from Toysmith proves that some of the world's best toys can be found in nature. Your young one will be dazzled by the colors! Included are kaleidoscope parts, assembly instructions, 2 nature drawings to be colored, coloring pencils, dried flowers, polished gemstones, minerals and glass marbles. Kids can also collect their own treasures in nature to try out in the kaleidoscope. Nature Kaleidoscope kit is recommended for ages 7 and up.
